name: A. Soft Drinking
statement:
This winter is so cold in Nvodsk! A group of friends decided to buy
bottles of a soft drink called "Take-It-Light" to warm up a bit. Each
bottle has milliliters of the drink. Also they bought limes and cut each
of them into slices. After that they found grams of salt.To make a
toast, each friend needs milliliters of the drink, a slice of lime and
grams of salt. The friends want to make as many toasts as they can,
provided they all drink the same amount. How many toasts can each friend
make?
